See less Victoria, British Columbia Victoria Scout House 505 Marigold, Victoria On Dec. 11, 1909, Esquimalt resident Lt.-Col. John A. Hall, former commanding officer of the 5th Regiment Canadian Army, initiated a meeting held in the Menzies Street Drill Hall in James Bay to see if there was sufficient interest in the area to form a Boy Scout troop. Seventy-two boys attended. On Jan. 11, 1910 the next step was taken at Hall’s home on Old Esquimalt Road to establish the first council of the Victoria Boy Scouts Association. Hall, instrumental in the organization of the 88th Victoria Fusiliers, was a natural choice to chair the council. In March 1910, the first badges were issued by the council and six troops organized, with the Esquimalt troop assigned 1st Arbutus,’ the name still in use today. In June, the first parade with all scouts in uniform was held at the drill hall after which Edgar Fawcett presented a Union Jack with the letters “V.B.S.” (Victoria Boy Scouts) in the centre. This brigade flag as it was known was presented to the troop with the largest number of scouts on parade. Guests See All

Saturday at 19:00 Cafe Runway Caffè Fantastico Specialty Coffees About Discussion More About Discussion Cafe Runway Interested Going Invite Details 4 people responded Event by Olive ThisTea Caffè Fantastico Specialty Coffees Public · Anyone on or off Facebook CAFE RUNWAY - February 22nd TICKETS https://www.universe.com/.../cafe-runway-february-22nd... Welcome back, one and all, to the coziest little show at the coziest little cafe in town! Come in from the snow and warm up with a latte and a lotta laughs as these fabulous performers twirl and whirl around for you. It's Cafe Runway, the all ages drag cabaret! PRESALE : $15 | DOOR : $20 kids under 6 get in free! HOSTED BY OLIVE THISTEA FEATURING TINO BAMBINO SOVEREIGN ACE MISS PINK DIVA RAFFORDI JUSTICE BONNIE V BON ACE OF SPADES ALEXIS ASTRO TOM FOOLERY *Masks are encouraged and celebrated, especially when moving around the space. Please respect everyone's safety and comfort and continue to social distance. Land Acknowledgement: This show is happening on the traditional and stolen lands of the W̱SÁNEĆ and Lekwungen peoples, known today as the Songhees and Esquimalt First Nations. We are committed to working towards decolonization, reconciliation, and reclaimation. *Caffe Fantastico has two levels connected by 2 stairs with a railing. Both the Quadra St and Kings Rd entries are level with the sidewalk. There is a single use wheelchair accessible restroom on both the upper and lower level. *Scent free space! Please respect those with scent sensitivities and refrain from wearing perfume or heavily scented products. *There will be amplified sound via microphone and speakers. Lighting is overhead with no flashing lights. *There is street parking available, as well as bus stops less than one block from the cafe. Please reach out to us to discuss accessibility if needed! This show is a space for LGBTQ+ art. Allies are welcome to join us, please respect the artists and community. There is zero tolerance for racist, homophobic, transphobic, fatphobic, ableist or sexist behaviour. See less Victoria, British Columbia Caffè Fantastico Specialty Coffees 965 Kings Road, Victoria Guests See All

Sunday 30 March 2025 from 18:00-23:30 WACKEN METAL BATTLE 2025 : VANCOUVER ISLAND ELIMINATION ROUND. March 30 @ Lucky Bar Lucky Bar, Victoria About Discussion More About Discussion WACKEN METAL BATTLE 2025 : VANCOUVER ISLAND ELIMINATION ROUND. March 30 @ Lucky Bar Interested Going Invite Details 235 people responded Event by The Invisible Orange , Wacken Metal Battle Canada and 5 others Lucky Bar, Victoria Tickets orangetickets.ca/detalles_evento.php Public · Anyone on or off Facebook The annual METAL BATTLE is BACK for 2025!!  WACKEN METAL BATTLE is an international band contest, established in 2004, that aims at discovering new talent and supporting the scene worldwide. With this, the Wacken Open Air supports up & coming artists on a global scale, offering its resources and stages ( https://www.metal-battle.com/ ). The Metal Battle has grown to include 62 countries that hold national heats and are eligible to send the winners to Wacken. An international jury votes on the performances, the best groups receive financial support from the Wacken Foundation as well as instruments and equipment provided by Metal Battle’s partners. Last but not least, the contest offers the possibility to get in touch with people from the music business worldwide. The contest has supported several bands throughout the years and has been a pivotal career launchpad for bands like Drone, Torture Squad, Battle Beast and Hammercult, to name a few. ***THE CHALLENGERS FOR THE VANCOUVER ISLAND ELIMINATION ROUND ARE*** : YEGG Old school death metal http://instagram.com/yeggmetal/ https://www.facebook.com/yeggmetal/ https://yeggmetal.bandcamp.com/track/offal-offering/ ELECTRIC DRUIDS Alternative metal https://www.instagram.com/electricdruidscanada/ https://www.facebook.com/ElectricDruids/ https://open.spotify.com/artist/0t7yMy9eJnsf4bFsbOUUnC GATE THEORY Experimental metal https://www.instagram.com/gate.theory/ https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552327835895 https://open.spotify.com/artist/2q89wjeTOFgpuufuumMUEx DECRYPTOR Death metal https://www.instagram.com/decryptorband/ https://www.facebook.com/DecryptorMetal/ https://open.spotify.com/artist/0o56HMJqzMeM1BgTcud6qU ANTLER Alternative metal https://www.instagram.com/antlerbandofficial/ https://www.facebook.com/AntlerBandCanada/ https://open.spotify.com/artist/5Ex0j3kBLXs4hMMcHnFZsH The winning band will continue to the BC semi-finals in Vancouver on May 3rd, from where one winner will represent BC at the National final, to be held in Vancouver on May 31 at The Rickshaw Theatre. ***Ages 19 and over.*** See less Music and audio Victoria, British Columbia Tickets Find Tickets Lucky Bar, Victoria 503 Yates St, Victoria, BC V8W, Canada Guests See All
